mapper.select: select id, order_rel_id, order_id, added_by_name, added_time, last_modified_by_name, last_modified_time, valid from t_order_rel where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select id, order_rel_id, order_id, added_by_name, added_time, last_modified_by_name, last_modified_time, valid from t_order_rel
select id, order_rel_id, order_id, added_by_name, added_time, last_modified_by_name, last_modified_time, valid from t_order_rel where valid = 'T' order by id DESC limit 1
